thread.section_title: Coin Advisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Coin Advisor | coinadvisor.com
thread.title: Anthony C
thread.title_full: Coin Advisor reviewed by Anthony C

author: Anthony C
title: Anthony C
text: Jim White does a great job of keeping me up to date on the latest releases of graded silver eagles. If Chris has a special coming up down the road I am notified by Jim as well. Jim always takes the time to explain the entire item, even though sometimes I can't keep up with all of the different terminology! He makes sure I get the best coin for my specific collection. Hands down these guys are the best coin dealer on the web!! I have purchased from a few other places in the past, no one comes close to comparing to the service I receive with coin advisor.
